project_name: Inco Network - Confidential Computing on EVM
description: Inco is the universal confidentiality layer for Web3, providing a modular Layer-1 blockchain that combines Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE), Zero-Knowledge proofs, Trusted Execution Environments (TEE), and Multi-Party Computation (MPC). Inco offers two products: Inco Lightning (powered by TEE for near-zero latency) and Inco Atlas (using FHE/MPC for maximum privacy). The network enables confidential storage, computing, and access control for Ethereum and other public blockchains, supporting use cases like private AMMs, dark pools, under-collateralized lending, and gaming with hidden information.

primary_technique.name: Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE)
primary_technique.description: Allows computations to be performed on encrypted data without decryption

fhevm_architecture.description: EVM augmented with TFHE for encrypted smart contract execution

coprocessor_architecture.description: Offchain FHE computation with onchain verification
workflow: Smart contract calls TFHE library on L1
L1 produces pointer to result (no actual FHE computation on L1)
Offchain server monitors L1 and computes FHE operations
Results verified and committed back to chain

functionality: Process encrypted data inside secure enclaves
Execute encrypted operations triggered by smart contracts
Handle blockchain requests for confidential computations

key_management.key_distribution: Global network key distributed among multiple parties
security_properties: No single party holds complete key

end_to_end_encryption.transaction_privacy: Encrypted transactions never visible to anyone
end_to_end_encryption.state_privacy: Encrypted states maintained onchain at all times
end_to_end_encryption.composability: Encrypted data can be used in smart contract operations

zero_knowledge_proofs.integration: Combined with FHE for enhanced privacy

tee.use_case: Inco Lightning for low-latency confidential compute

project_description: Inco is the universal confidentiality layer for Web3, providing a modular Layer-1 blockchain that combines Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE), Zero-Knowledge proofs, Trusted Execution Environments (TEE), and Multi-Party Computation (MPC). Inco offers two products: Inco Lightning (powered by TEE for near-zero latency) and Inco Atlas (using FHE/MPC for maximum privacy). The network enables confidential storage, computing, and access control for Ethereum and other public blockchains, supporting use cases like private AMMs, dark pools, under-collateralized lending, and gaming with hidden information.
